AAU Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Unskilled Worker Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 12:07 IST
 Assam Agricultural University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Assam |  Salary : 11,550 to 11,550




FOLLOW

Assam Agricultural University (AAU) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Unskilled Worker Jobs. Those candidates who have completed their 8th, 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the AAU Recruitment 2025. Here we mentioned more details about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application form and attend the interview at the address given below.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Assam

AAU Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Unskilled Worker 	01	8th, 10th Pass

Age Limit for the AAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 18 years

Selection Process for the AAU Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the AAU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 11,550 /- per month.

Application fee for the AAU Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the AAU Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Unskilled Worker Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, attend the interview along with the application form and relevant documents at the address given below.

Venue

Office of Associate Dean, Lakhimpur College of Veterinary Science (LCVSc), AAU, Joyhing, North Lakhimpur

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Interview	26-08-2025
Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
